Record.ClassificationPath: Digestive System Diseases/Gastrointestinal Diseases/Stomach Diseases/Gastric Outlet Obstruction/Pyloric Stenosis
Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Gastrointestinal Disorder/Stomach Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Stomach Disorder/Pyloric Stenosis
Record.Description: Narrowing of the pyloric canal with varied etiology. A common form is due to muscle hypertrophy (PYLORIC STENOSIS, HYPERTROPHIC) seen in infants.
